alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Humphreys; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 9:17PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Holmes, northeastern Yazoo and southern Humphreys Counties through 1000 PM CST... At 917 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Midnight, or 9 miles west of Thornton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Thornton around 930 PM CST. Tolarville and Coxburg around 935 PM CST. Howard around 940 PM CST. Brozville and Ebenezer around 945 PM CST. Franklin and Lexington around 950 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Eden, Silver City and Louise. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
